mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_userid, member_userpwd, member_name, member_address,member_phone,member_joindate,member_type,member_lastlogindate) VALUES (#{member_userid}, #{member_userpwd}, #{member_name}, #{member_address},#{member_phone}, now(),#{member_type},now());
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE member_userid = #{member_userid} AND member_name = #{member_name} AND member_phone = #{member_phone}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_userpwd = #{member_userpwd} where member_userid = #{member_userid}
